entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual studio is crashing when using self builded Hostfxr #110895
  • [API Proposal]: Be able to set a Int64 and Int128 seed to Random #110892
  • hostfxr_* Functions Return int Instead of StatusCode Enum #110891
  • LoggerFilterRule.CategoryName matches overlapping prefix and suffix #110890
  • The UdpClient cannot listen to IPv6 multicast messages. #110889
  • XDocument: Cannot identify and manipulate XText nodes without breaking whitespace formatting #110887

Closed

  • Libraries test fails with "Method has zero rva" error #108641
  • Consider putting the runtime in a sub folder #2572
  • DataflowLinkOptions.MaxMessages is ignored for a link to encapsulated block #35751

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: unroll more memset patterns #110893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix GetModuleFileName in GetProcessPath #110888
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Do not encode safe points with -1 offset. #110845
    area-VM-coreclr, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix ReadBufferState dispose cases #110739
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution

Updated

  • Tweak `EncodeToUtf16_Vector128` #110203
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix `IDE0004` for object comparison #110206
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet watch crashes with fsproj is not associated with a language #45610

Updated

  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
    10.0.1xx
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
    10.0.1xx
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
    10.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
    10.0.1xx
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    10.0.1xx
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
    10.0.1xx
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
    10.0.1xx
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
    10.0.1xx
  • `dotnet sln add` should allow non-project files to be added to the solution #9611
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Not warn CS8600 (may be not a bug) #76551
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35621.19 #76553
  • ExtractMethod -- Always extract something, even if advanced techniques cannot be applied #283
    Backlog

Updated

  • Langword null fixer breaks when `null` is at the end of the strinrg #76548

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow null langword fixer at the end of an XML tag #76552
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extract method cleanup #76550
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not dismiss extract method when a notification is shown to the user #76549
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Introduce local variable supporting target-type new syntax #76342
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: tls-renegotiation-kestrel #59604
  • Perf improvement: tls-handshakes-kestrel #59603
  • Current Blazor event handling fails for some CustomElement scenarios #59602
  • Find a way to prevent project to be selectable as Startup #59599
  • Model binding using IParsable<T> doesn't allow handling of null values #59597

Closed

  • Perf regression: antiforgery-noop, fortunes_ef #59594
  • Add Support For Full MVC In AOT #59600
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-validation #59593

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify PublicTopLevelProgramGenerator #59601
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent `Equals`/`GetHashCode` methods in `SqlConstantExpression` #35372
  • Memory consumption, memory leaks #35369

PullRequests

Created

  • More translation test work (basic operators, string case sensitivity...) #35373
  • [SMALL] Split TemporalTranslations into per-type suites #35371
  • Add support for primitive collections to the compiled model #35370
